workflowPermissions.description: This workflow requires these permissions to run properly

contextMenus.description: To execute the workflow via the context menu

downloads.title: Download
downloads.description: Saving the page assets and renaming the downloaded file

updateMessage.text1: Automa has been updated to v{version},

auth.title: Auth
auth.username: You need to set your username first
auth.text: You need to be signed in before you can do that

running.message: This only display the last 5 logs

arrow.title: Line arrow
arrow.description: Add an arrow at the end of the line

snapGrid.title: Snap to the grid
snapGrid.description: Snap to the grid when moving a block

language.label: Language
language.helpTranslate: Can't find your language? Help translate.
language.reloadPage: Reload the page to take effect

backupWorkflows.title: Local Backup
backupWorkflows.name: Backup workflows
backupWorkflows.needSignin: You need to sign in to your account first

cloud.title: Cloud Backup
cloud.storedWorkflows: Workflows that are stored in the cloud
cloud.selectText: Select workflows that you want to backup
cloud.needSelectWorkflow: You need to select workflows that you want to backup

previewMode.title: Preview mode
previewMode.description: You're in preview mode, changes you made won't be saved

messages.notFound: Can't find hosted workflow with "{id}" id

unpublish.title: Unpublish workflow
unpublish.body: Are you sure want to unpublish "{name}" workflow?

protect.title: Protect workflow
protect.note: Note: you must remember this password, this password will be required to edit and delete the workflow later on.

locked.title: This Workflow is Protected
locked.body: Input the password to unlock it

settings.executedBlockOnWeb: Show executed block on web page

notification.title: Workflow notification
notification.description: Show workflow status(success or failed) after it executed
notification.noPermission: Automa requires "notifications" permission to make this work

publicId.title: Workflow public Id
publicId.description: Use this public id to execute workflow using JS custom event

defaultColumn.title: Insert into the default column
defaultColumn.description: Insert data to the default column if there's no column selected in the block
defaultColumn.name: Default column name

autocomplete.title: Autocomplete
autocomplete.description: Enable autocomplete in the input block (disable if it makes Automa unstable)

clearCache.title: Clear cache
clearCache.description: Clear cache (state and loop index) of the workflow

reuseLastState.title: Reuse last workflow state
reuseLastState.description: Use the state data (table, variables, and global data) from the last executed workflow

debugMode.title: Debug mode
debugMode.description: Execute the workflow using the Chrome DevTools Protocol

restartWorkflow.description: Max how many times the workflow will restart

onError.title: On workflow error
onError.description: Set what to do when an error occurs in the workflow

blockDelay.title: Block delay (milliseconds)
blockDelay.description: Add delay before executing each of the blocks

tabLoadTimeout.title: Tab load timeout
tabLoadTimeout.description: Maximum time to load tab in milliseconds, pass 0 to disable the timeout.

collection.dragDropText: Drop a workflow or block in here

atOnce.title: Execute all workflows in the collection at once
atOnce.description: Block not gonna executed when using this option

globalData.note: This will overwrite the global data of the workflow

clearLogs.title: Clear logs
clearLogs.description: Are you sure to clear all logs?

messages.invalid-body: Content body is not valid JSON

messages.stop-timeout: Workflow is stopped because of timeout
messages.no-file-access: Automa doesn't have access to the file

messages.no-clipboard-acces: Don't have permission to access clipboard
messages.browser-not-supported: This feature not supported in {browser} browser
messages.element-not-found: Can't find an element with "{selector}" selector.

messages.not-iframe: Element with "{selector}" selector is not an Iframe element
messages.iframe-not-found: Can't find an Iframe element with "{selector}" selector.
messages.workflow-infinite-loop: Can't execute the workflow to prevent an infinite loop
messages.not-debug-mode: The workflow must run in debug mode for this block to work properly
messages.no-iframe-id: Can't find Frame ID for the iframe element with "{selector}" selector
messages.no-tab: Can't connect to a tab, use "New tab" or "Active tab" block before using the "{name}" block.

delete.title: Delete log
delete.description: Are you sure want to delete all the selected logs?
